attributes.review: This app gave me cancer. F**k trump.

attributes.title: i only downloaded this to write a review✨

attributes.review: The mobile app for Donald Trump's 2020 re-election campaign collects vast amounts of personal data and is a privacy risk. The app seeks a cell phone number for verification alongside personal details including name, home address and zip code. Once downloaded, it seeks access to contacts, rough location, Bluetooth pairing, storage, ID and call information and more. Aside from this the app is also very slow and full of ads. It constantly notifies you through the night and takes forever to download. I have had some bad apps on my phone but this is by far the worst it has also slowed down my phone and I think I have to buy a new one. 10/10 do NOT recommend DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: GEN Z

attributes.title: No hope

attributes.review:
Eww.The app is terrible for the soul purpose of it having to do with trump. I dont like him and never will.The app is garbage. The Apple Store needs to take it off the AppStore needs to take it down. Trump is a terrible person and president and needs to be put out of office. He is racist and he is a rapist. He is disgusting in so many ways. He is also a disgusting father figure. Go look at interviews of him and his daughter and you will catch SOME unbelievably disgusting things he says. You can also look at videos of interviews, speeches, etc. and catch Some Of the racist remarks he has made. And if you don’t want to open your eyes and look it up then here’s some examples I’ll provide for you. to start he mocked George Floyd at one of his speeches repeatedly saying “I can’t breathe” while holding his neck. (Even though he doesn’t have one). He also called hispanics rapist and drug dealers. He also said that covid-19 was the Chinese virus. I could keep going. I have all day. But there’s other subjects that need to be touched on. 
There are more remarks he’s made about Women down grading them , belittling them and making them feel uncomfortable.  Instead of being president he needs to be in ✨prison✨. Also if you’re a trump supporter reading stop supporting him. He’s not worth your tim or money. He is a terrible person and it’s not to late to change/switch. Oh and also find other comebacks other then “trump 2020”. Anyways tootles🙈✨
attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would.

attributes.review: His first three years were decent at best but this last year says it all, we are on the verge of a civil war and he does nothing about it and when it involves him he hides in a bunker and says he was “inspecting it” when he has someone to do that. He has No regard for the safety and heath of others, at his latest rally be didn’t want anyone to wear masks so they could yell louder, also at the rally the owner of it had stickers in the seats you couldn’t sit and Trump went around the stadium right before his rally and teared then all of. He doesn’t care about anyone but his immediate family, his niece wrote a book and in this book she talks about how he is related to someone with a learning disability, the mother and father of this child ask trump, who they are related to, to help pay for the expenses of the child and he says “Why do I have to pay for it? Why should I pay for it?” His campaign slogan was “make America great again” and he has done the opposite. Also he has gone against Obama and removed the act that allows adoption centers to deny same sex couples. Let’s not forget to mention the fact that he sits on his ass being on Twitter almost hourly every day, and calls his coworkers childish names, he is 74 and he acts like he’s 4. Also he wants to be a dictator and have MORE power then he has, I think that says it all, why would you vote for the dictator of the playground we have now there is NO good reason to vote for him and if you do, you don’t care about and want to destroy the United States of America.
attributes.title: He’s a dictator of a playground nor a presidential
